reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MATH 215, MATH 255, MATH 256, MATH 265. (Familiarity with a programming language is required.)
ATSC 409 graduate level equivalent is ATSC 506.
courseName: Numerical Techniques for Ocean, Atmosphere and Earth Scientists
description: Web-based introduction to the practical numerical solution of ordinary and partial differential equations including considerations of stability and accuracy. Credit will be granted for only one of ATSC 409 or ATSC 506/EOSC 511.
